name: Stephen Gould
content: Stephen Gould research | students | publications | software | activities | patents | links Stephen Gould I'm a Professor of Computer Science at the Australian National University. [ short bio ] Email: Phone: +61-(0)2-6125-8642 (office) +61-(0)408-879-963 (AUS mobile) Office Hours: Tuesdays 11am-12pm (drop-in) Address/Office: Anderson Building (115), Room B165, The Australian National University, Corner North and Daley Roads, Acton, ACT, 2601 AUSTRALIA News and Events (2025-10) We have been awarded an ARC Discovery project for work on differentiable optimisation for constrained three-dimensional shape design. (2025-10) I will be teaching a new deep learning course next year (COMP3242/6242). (2025-09) We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS 2025. Congratulations to Evan. (2025-07) We have a paper accepted to BMVC 2025. Congratulations to Francis. (2025-06) We have two papers accepted to ICCV 2025. Congratulations to Jiahao and Chamin. (2025-06) I will be presenting at MLSS 2026 in Melbourne, 2-13 February 2026. [ more ] (2025-05) We have a paper accepted to ICML 2025. Congratulations to Qinyu. (2025-04) We have a paper accepted to SIGGRAPH 2025. Congratulations to Chunyi. (2025-03) We have a paper accepted to IJCNN 2025. Congratulations to Yiqun. (2025-02) We have two papers accepted to CVPR 2025. Congratulations to Weijian, Chamin and all co-authors. (2025-01) The Australasian Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AJCAI) will be held in Canberra, 1-5 December 2025. (2024-12) We have two papers accepted to FG 2025. Congratulations to Francis and K. (2024-11) We have a paper accepted to 3DV 2025. Congratulations to Chunyi. (2024-10) We have a paper accepted to WACV 2025. Congratulations to Jiahao. (2024-09) We have two papers accepted to NeurIPS 2024. Congratulations to Evan, Itzik and co-authors. (2024-07) We have two papers accepted to ECCV 2024. Congratulations to Qinyu and Yanbin. (2024-06) I'll be giving a talk titled "Input, more input" at the 3rd CVPR Workshop on Vision Datasets Understanding. (2024-05) We have a paper accepted to ICML 2024. Congratulations to Weijie. (2024-03) I will be teaching COMP8536 Advanced Topics in Deep Learning for Computer Vision in Semester 2, 2024. (2024-02) We have five papers accepted to CVPR 2024. Congratulations to all authors. (2024-02) We have a paper accepted to TMLR and a paper accepted to ICAPS 2024. Congratulations to David and Oliver. (2024-01) We have a paper accepted to ICLR 2024. Congratulations to Qinyu. (2023-11) We have released v2.0.5 of our video annotation tool (vidat). (2023-10) We have five papers accepted to WACV 2024. Congratulations to all authors. (2023-09) We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS 2023. Congratulations to Ming and Tim. (2023-07) We have four papers accepted to ICCV 2023. Congratulations to Fred, Peixia, Zun, Yicong and all co-authors. (2023-06) We have two papers accepted to the Differentiable Almost Anything workshop, ICML 2023. Congratulations to Zhiwei and all other authors. (2023-04) We have a paper accepted to ICML 2023. Congratulations to Weijian. (2023-03) Our Ikea assembly in the wild (IAW) dataset is now available. (2023-02) We have three papers accepted to CVPR 2023. Congratulations to Jiahao, Chamin, Jas and all co-authors. (2023-01) We have a paper accepted to ICLR 2023. Congratulations to Ming. (2023-01) Welcome to new PhD students Chunyi, Evan and Qinyu, and new Research Fellow Weijian. (2022-12) Notes and slides for my ISAAC lectures are available here (updated) and here. (2022-12) Welcome to Ming who started today as a research fellow on a project collaborating with Seeing Machines. (2022-10) I will be speaking at ISAAC 2022 on differentiable optimisation in deep learning. (2022-09) Welcome to Yanbin who started today as a postdoc in my group. (2022-09) We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS 2022. Congratulations to Weijian. (2022-08) Welcome to Francis and Nutthadech who started their PhD programs today. (2022-06) We have a paper accepted to IROS. Congratulations to Zheyu, Itzik and Jiahao. (2022-04) We have been awarded an ARC Linkage award to work with Seeing Machines on in-vehicle situation awareness. (2022-03) Seeing Machines is sponsoring two PhD scholarships. Come work with Liang Zheng, Akshay Asthana and me to build technology for safer cars. (2022-03) We have three papers accepted to CVPR 2022. Congratulations to Fred, Yicong, Itzik, Chamin and all co-authors. (2022-02) I'm looking for a postdoc to join my group. See details here. Contact me if you're interested. Applications close 31 March 2022. (2022-01) We have a paper accepted to OT-SDM 2022. Congratulations team. (2021-12) Jiahao will be joining as a PhD student in March 2022. Welcome Jiahao! (2021-09) We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS 2021. Congratulations to Sameera. (2021-08) We have a paper accepted to ICDM 2021. Congratulations to Asiri. (2021-07) We have three papers accepted to ICCV 2021. Congratulations to Sadegh, Fred, David and all authors. (2021-05) Welcome to Zhiwei who joined the group today as a research fellow. (2021-05) We have a paper accepted to ICML 2021. Congratulations to Weijian. (2021-04) We have released efficient implementations of differentiable least-squares and optimal transport in our DDN library. (2021-03) We have two papers accepted to CVPR 2021. Congratulations to Fatemeh and Yicong. (2021-02) I'm hiring up to two postdocs (research fellows) to work with me on deep declarative networks. Apply here. (2021-01) Our ARCV survey paper on semantics for robotic mapping, perception and interaction led by Sourav Garg has been published. (2020-11) Congratulations to Fred for winning the RoboVis2020 3MT competition. [ talk ] (2020-11) We have a paper accepted to WACV 2021. Congratulations to Cristian. (2020-10) We have a paper accepted to 3DV 2020. Congratulations to Zac. (2020-10) Our Ikea Assembly Dataset has been released. Thanks to all the hard work by Itzik, Xin, Fatemeh, Dylan, Cristian and the team of assemblers and annotators. (2020-09) We have released our open-source video annotation tool. [ tutorials | code ] (2020-09) We have VLN papers accepted to both EMNLP and NeurIPS 2020. Congratulations to Yicong and team. (2020-09) Videos from our ECCV tutorial on Deep Declarative Networks are now online. (2020-08) We have a paper accepted to WACV 2021. Congratulations to Itzik and team. (2020-08) I am delighted to have been awarded a 2020 ARC Future Fellowship. (2020-07) We have three papers accepted to ECCV 2020. Congratulations to Itzik, Dylan and Yunzhong. (2020-07) We have a paper accepted to IROS 2020. Congratulations to Sameera. (2020-06) Our CVPR 2020 workshop on deep declarative networks is on 14 June. [ website | videos ] (2020-04) We have a paper accepted to CVPR 2020 workshop on Compositionality in Computer Vision. Congratulations to Rodrigo. (2020-04) We have a paper accepted to Advanced Photonics. Congratulations to Lei and team. (2020-02) We have two papers accepted to CVPR 2020. Congratulations to Sadegh and Yunzhong. (2020-02) Itzik Ben-Shabat will lead a tutorial on deep declarative networks and differentiable optimization at ECCV 2020. Details here. (2020-02) Details for our CVPR 2020 workshop on deep declarative networks are here. (2020-01) I will be teaching Advanced Topics in Machine Learning (COMP4680/COMP8650) in Semester 2, 2020. The course will cover convex optimization, deep learning and differentiable optimization. (2019-12) We have a paper accepted to ICLR 2020. Congratulations to Namhoon and Ajanthan. (2019-12) We have another paper accepted to WACV 2020. Congratulations to Sameera. (2019-11) We have a paper accepted to IJCV on 3D representation learning. Congratulations to Sameera Ramasinghe. (2019-11) We're running a workshop on Deep Declarative Networks at CVPR 2020. Details coming soon. (2019-10) Reference code and tutorials for deep declarative networks is now available on github. (2019-09) We have a paper accepted to WACV 2020. Congratulations to Cristian. (2019-09) I'm looking forward to visiting New Zealand in December to give a keynote address at IVCNZ 2019. (2019-07) Welcome to Itzik ben Shabat who joined the ACRV as a Research Fellow today. (2019-07) We have a paper accepted to ICCV. Congratulations to Amirreza and Amir. (2019-05) I will be giving a talk on "AI and Advanced Machine Learning" at IP Australia. (2019-04) Our ARC Linkage grant proposal with Seeing Machines has been awarded. Congratulations to Dragomir Neshev and team. (2019-02) We have a paper accepted to CVPR. Congratulations to Dylan. (2019-01) Welcome to our new ACRV Research Fellows Fatemeh Saleh, Thalaiyasingam Ajanthan, Xin Yu and Yon Ng. (2018-12) I will be teaching Advanced Topics in Machine Learning (COMP4680/COMP8650) next semester. Topics will include convex optimisation and deep learning. (2018-09) We have a paper accepted to PAMI. Congratulations to Rodrigo. (2018-09) We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS. Congratulations to Peter. (2018-08) Dylan Campbell joined the Australian Centre for Robotic Vision as a Research Fellow today. Welcome Dylan! (2018-08) We have a paper accepted to IJCV. Congratulations to Anoop. (2018-07) I am the new convenor for the BAC(Honours) and BAC(R&D) degrees. Come to my office hours for advice. (2018-06) I will be teaching Advanced Topics in Statistical Machine Learning (COMP4680/COMP8650) next semester. Topics will include convex optimisation and deep learning. (2018-05) We have up to seven postdoc positions available in robotic and computer vision (click for details and to apply). (2018-04) I will be back at ANU fulltime from 1 May after having spent 14 months working on projects at Amazon. (2018-02) We have four papers accepted to CVPR 2018. Congratulations to Jue, Peter and Anoop. (2018-01) We have a paper accepted to WACV 2018. Congratulations to Rodrigo. (2017-09) We are one of seven teams to be awarded a Facebook ParlAI Research Award. Congratulations to Peter, Qi, Damien, Niko and Ant
